LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.label: Sapsal
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.description: A multi-purpose tank suitable for reconnaissance, fortification and elimination.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.label: Sapsal (support type)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.description: A unarmed light tank specialized in supporting psycasters by absorbing their neural heat. It is also equipped with an emergency healing ray.
